title: 2012 election : support for Romney and Obama , by ethnic group
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Obama, and Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Black.
In Race Black, Obama had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Race White (non-Hispanic) out of all 4 Races.
Race Black and White (non-Hispanic) had the biggest gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Obama.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Obama, and Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Black.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Obama, and Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Black.
In Race Black, Obama had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Race White (non-Hispanic) out of all 4 Races.
Race Black and White (non-Hispanic) had the biggest gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Obama.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Obama, and Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Race Black had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for Obama. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Race Black for Romney.
In Race Black, Obama had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Race White (non-Hispanic) out of all 4 Races.
Race Black and White (non-Hispanic) had the biggest gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Obama.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of Obama.
On average, the Race White (non-Hispanic) had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups Obama, and Romney. Whereas Nonwhite had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
